body:
Hello! My name is vsplesk101 (Max) And i made another video.. Because sony vegas cant properly render my videos (For some reason). I will have to learn to Use Adobe After effects.. But Until then i might just have someone else edit my videos :P (Most likely not). But when i do get After effects you will see a GREAT improvement in my videos, From Motion blur, To 1080p Resolution (Which i have but doesnt look like it) I have 2 account on which to upload. A Vimeo, And Youtube. Youtube is going to be my main Upload Place... I guess. Vimeo is just for 60FPS+ Videos.. Which youtube doesnt support. Without further a due:

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ob7FnbfSeyk&feature=youtu.be
 
Vimeo: (Processing)
 
Leave suggestions and all dat fun stuff :3
 
YES:
I will do commentary!
I will Put music in!
Try to get OBS to function properly
 
NO:
I wont be making 20+ minute videos, 20 min at MAX (My upload speed is crap)
